code_General.utilities.oauth¶

Generic Backend

Thomas Skodawessely & Silvio Weging 2024

Contains: Oauth token management class

Classes¶

ManageToken

Manage oauth token class.

Module Contents¶

class code_General.utilities.oauth.ManageToken(client_id, client_secret, token_endpoint, token_endpoint_auth_method)¶

Manage oauth token class.

_token = None¶
client: authlib.integrations.requests_client.OAuth2Session = None¶
client_id = None¶
client_secret = None¶
token_endpoint = None¶
token_endpoint_auth_method = None¶
__getattr__(item)¶
__del__()¶
getAccessToken()¶

Get initial token. Made as a function to be callable from outside. Reminder for me: It makes no sense to save this access token in redis because it expires much to quickly!

checkIfExpired()¶

Check if token has expired and if so, refresh it.

KISS-backend
